properties.entry: SELECT SPACE_NO, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_KIND, SPACE_ONE_INTRODUCE, SPACE_INTRODUCE, SPACE_TAG, SPACE_INFORMATION, SPACE_CAUTION, SPACE_MIMG, SPACE_IMG, SPACE_ADDRESS, SPACE_DETAIL_ADDRESS, SPACE_PRICE, SPACE_LOCATION, SPACE_TEL, SPACE_CAPACITY, SPACE_RESERVATION_STATUS, SPACE_ENROLL_DATE, SPACE_ENROLL_STATUS, USER_NO FROM SPACE WHERE SPACE_NO = ?

INSERT INTO SPACE ( SPACE_NO, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_KIND, SPACE_ONE_INTRODUCE, SPACE_INTRODUCE, SPACE_TAG, SPACE_INFORMATION, SPACE_CAUTION, SPACE_ADDRESS, SPACE_DETAIL_ADDRESS, SPACE_PRICE, SPACE_LOCATION, SPACE_TEL, SPACE_CAPACITY, USER_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO, REF_SNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_SNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT SPACE_NO, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_TAG, SPACE_ADDRESS, SPACE_PRICE, SPACE_CAPACITY FROM SPACE WHERE SPACE_ENROLL_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SPACE_NO DESC

SELECT SPACE_NO, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_TAG, SPACE_ADDRESS, SPACE_PRICE, SPACE_CAPACITY, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLE_IMG" FROM SPACE S JOIN MEMBER M ON (S.USER_NO=M.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_SNO=S.SPACE_NO) WHERE M.USER_NO = ?

SELECT DISTINCT SPACE_NO, SPACE_NAME, SPACE_TAG, SPACE_ADDRESS, SPACE_PRICE, SPACE_CAPACITY
FROM SPACE S JOIN MEMBER M ON (S.USER_NO=M.USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_NO = ?
